title: Licensee reports no license URL in 2.8 artifacts
body:
### Description

Licenses information in POMs of 2.8 artifacts is malformed:

```
2.8:
  <licenses>
    <license>
      <url>https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt</url>
    </license>
    <license>
      <name>The Apache Software License, Version 2.0</name>
      <distribution>repo</distribution>
    </license>
  </licenses>

2.7:
  <licenses>
    <license>
      <name>The Apache Software License, Version 2.0</name>
      <url>http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt</url>
      <distribution>repo</distribution>
    </license>
  </licenses>
```

### Steps to Reproduce

1. Add [Licensee](https://github.com/cashapp/licensee) to the project that has dependency on `com.squareup.leakcanary:leakcanary-android`
2. Run Licensee task
3. Licensee task fails with:
```
com.squareup.leakcanary:leakcanary-android:2.8
 - ERROR: Unknown license name 'The Apache Software License, Version 2.0' with no URL is NOT allowed
com.squareup.leakcanary:leakcanary-android-core:2.8
 - ERROR: Unknown license name 'The Apache Software License, Version 2.0' with no URL is NOT allowed
com.squareup.leakcanary:leakcanary-android-utils:2.8
 - ERROR: Unknown license name 'The Apache Software License, Version 2.0' with no URL is NOT allowed
com.squareup.leakcanary:leakcanary-object-watcher:2.8
 - ERROR: Unknown license name 'The Apache Software License, Version 2.0' with no URL is NOT allowed
com.squareup.leakcanary:leakcanary-object-watcher-android:2.8
 - ERROR: Unknown license name 'The Apache Software License, Version 2.0' with no URL is NOT allowed
com.squareup.leakcanary:leakcanary-object-watcher-android-androidx:2.8
 - ERROR: Unknown license name 'The Apache Software License, Version 2.0' with no URL is NOT allowed
com.squareup.leakcanary:leakcanary-object-watcher-android-core:2.8
 - ERROR: Unknown license name 'The Apache Software License, Version 2.0' with no URL is NOT allowed
com.squareup.leakcanary:leakcanary-object-watcher-android-support-fragments:2.8
 - ERROR: Unknown license name 'The Apache Software License, Version 2.0' with no URL is NOT allowed
com.squareup.leakcanary:plumber-android:2.8
 - ERROR: Unknown license name 'The Apache Software License, Version 2.0' with no URL is NOT allowed
com.squareup.leakcanary:plumber-android-core:2.8
 - ERROR: Unknown license name 'The Apache Software License, Version 2.0' with no URL is NOT allowed
com.squareup.leakcanary:shark:2.8
 - ERROR: Unknown license name 'The Apache Software License, Version 2.0' with no URL is NOT allowed
com.squareup.leakcanary:shark-android:2.8
 - ERROR: Unknown license name 'The Apache Software License, Version 2.0' with no URL is NOT allowed
com.squareup.leakcanary:shark-graph:2.8
 - ERROR: Unknown license name 'The Apache Software License, Version 2.0' with no URL is NOT allowed
com.squareup.leakcanary:shark-hprof:2.8
 - ERROR: Unknown license name 'The Apache Software License, Version 2.0' with no URL is NOT allowed
com.squareup.leakcanary:shark-log:2.8
 - ERROR: Unknown license name 'The Apache Software License, Version 2.0' with no URL is NOT allowed
```

**Expected behavior:** Licensee task passes

### Version Information

* LeakCanary version: 2.8
